column4: Can anyone help me out? My system is hanging when i get to a certian point in the installaion. It hangs during the detect hardware part while it says "Starting PC Card Services..."
there are no cards or anythin
you can disable the loading of pcmcia drivers from the boot line
see the help by pressing F3 when the boot line appears when you boot from the installer cd
would you mind walking me through it i'm really new to linux
when you boot from the installer cd, there's an orange Ubuntu screen that shows up
I hit F1. then hit F3. then i type in pcmcia=off and hit enter but it dosen't accept it
you need to type the image name first.
i typed in linux pcmcia:off but it still stalls there
I may, but ping me first
